alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 2:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern St. Tammany and southeastern Tangipahoa Parishes through 300 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Madisonville, or 7 miles west of Covington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Abita Springs, Madisonville, Folsom and Lacombe. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 48 and 70. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern St. Tammany; Southwestern St. Tammany
